user_query: I'm a student conducting research on renewable energy sources and their impact on the environment. Can you provide me with data and statistics on the usage and adoption of renewable energy in different countries? Additionally, I would like to know if there are any government policies or incentives that promote renewable energy.

TaskList.description: Gather data on the usage and adoption rates of renewable energy sources in various countries.
Analyze the gathered data to extract relevant statistics about renewable energy adoption.
Research and compile information about government policies and incentives that promote renewable energy in different countries.
Summarize the findings from subtasks 2 and 3 to prepare a comprehensive report.
